Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the plant LTP family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Plant non-specific lipid-transfer proteins transfer phospholipids as well as galactolipids across membranes. May play a role in wax or cutin deposition in the cell walls of expanding epidermal cells and certain secretory tissues (By similarity).

Literature.Title: Characterization and antifungal properties of wheat nonspecific lipid transfer proteins.
Literature.Author: Sun JY, Gaudet DA, Lu ZX, Frick M, Puchalski B, Laroche A.

Literature.Title: Cold induced expression of plant defensin and lipid transfer protein transcripts in winter wheat.
Literature.Author: Puchalski B.,Huel R.,Frick M.,Laroche A.,Gaudet D.A.
